definition: World Exposition/abbr. for 世界博覽會|世界博览会[Shi4 jie4 Bo2 lan3 hui4], World Expo
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Expo 010 is organized by Chinese Government, and operated by the city of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海世博会由中国政府主办上海市承办。

sentences.english: Save your money and visit the EXPO in shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 钱省下来去上海看世博会。

sentences.english: During the Expo, people will exchange experiences of urban sustainable development.
sentences.chinese: 世博会期间，人们将就城市可持续发展交流经验。

sentences.english: We want to do something for our city and the Expo.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我们希望为自己的城市和世博会做些事。

sentences.english: Time goes by and the World Expo has gone through 158 years.
sentences.chinese: 斗转星移，世博会已经走过了158个春秋。

sentences.english: The Shanghai Expo ticket sales in Hong Kong was officially launched three months ago.
sentences.chinese: 三个月前，上海世博会的门票正式在香港开售。

sentences.english: Expo has come out with its "purdah" to the world.
sentences.chinese: 世博会又带其走出来“深闺”走向了世界。

sentences.english: That's too bad, because this one, in Shanghai, is unusually ambitious.
sentences.chinese: 真是太糟糕了，因为这次的上海世博会非比寻常。

sentences.english: What is Bilbao going to show in the Expo?
sentences.chinese: 毕尔巴鄂将在世博会上展示什么？

sentences.english: The incandescent lamp was intruduced into people's life through its first display in a World's Fair.
sentences.chinese: 白炽灯是通过世博会的展示才被普及使用的。

sentences.english: ASEAN congratulates China on successfully hosting the World Expo.
sentences.chinese: 东盟祝贺中国成功举办上海世博会。

sentences.english: Liu hoped the MPs may visit the Expo to celebrate the event together.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎各位议员到世博会参观，共襄盛举。

sentences.english: Since 1982, China has attended 12 World Expos.
sentences.chinese: 从1982年起，中国共参加了12次世博会。

sentences.english: The Expo Bureau is responsible for the day-to-day works of the Executive Committee.
sentences.chinese: 支委会的日常办事机构是上海世博会事务协调局。

sentences.english: She welcomes Governor Perdue to visit China and attend the Shanghai World Expo in this September.
sentences.chinese: 高总欢迎珀杜州长今年9月访华和参加上海世博会。

sentences.english: What is the full name of Expo 2010?

definition: World Expo/abbr. to 世博[Shi4 bo2]
abbr. for 世界博覽會|世界博览会[Shi4 jie4 Bo2 lan3 hui4], World Expo
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
China Export Commodities Fair also known as the Canton Fair

pinyin: Dong1 fang1 Ming2 zhu1 Dian4 shi4 Ta3

definition: the Great Hall of the People in Beijing
